WmsMapLayer
object in module npn-viz-tool

Description

A map layer object associated with a specific google map.

Methods

  • currentYearOnly()

    Indicates whether a given layer should constrain what gets plotted on it to the currently selected year.

    Returns
    boolean

    true if plotted data should be restrained.

  • fit()

    Fit the map to this layers defined bounds.

    Returns
    npn-viz-tool.vis-map-services:WmsMapLayer

    this map layer instance.

  • getBounds()

    Get the bounds for this layer.

    Returns
    google.maps.LatLngBounds

    The layer's bounds.

  • getDescription()

    Get the layer description, if any.

    Returns
    string

    The description.

  • getGriddedData(latLng)

    Fetch gridded data for a specific location on this map layer.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

    The point under which to fetch the data for.

    Returns
    promise

    A promise that will be resolved with an array of numbers, or rejected.

  • getLegend()

    Get the legend associated with this layer.

    Returns
    promise

    A promise that will be resolve with the legend when it arrives (npn-viz-tool.vis-map-services:WmsMapLegend) .

  • getMap()

    Get the google map instance this layer is associated with.

    Returns
    google.maps.Map

    The map instance.

  • off()

    Take this layer off the map.

    Returns
    npn-viz-tool.vis-map-services:WmsMapLayer

    this map layer instance.

  • on()

    Put this layer on the map.

    Returns
    npn-viz-tool.vis-map-services:WmsMapLayer

    this map layer instance.

  • supportsData()

    Indicates whether a given layer supports data to be plotted on it or not.

    Returns
    boolean

    false if the layer doesn't support data plotted on it.

Properties

  • googleLayer

    The underlying google layer (google.maps.ImageMapType)
